properties.name: APRIL 3 ONLY: Special Event: Keep Pittsburgh Fishy: A Fish Fry Benefiting PERSAD Center
properties.description:
Friday, April 3, 5-10pm
Spirit, 242 51st Street

For the 3rd year in a row...
Come join us for a secular Fish Fry to benefit the PERSAD CENTER, a local non-profit strengthening the region's LGBTQ communities and their allies.

Enjoy the splendor of the Lenten Fish Fry season while supporting equality and empathy. Plus, this is your opportunity to check out Spirit Hall in Lawrenceville.

More information will be rolling in over the next few weeks, including DJs/entertainment (Fishcothèque after-party?).

$10 gets you...

-A spiced cornmeal crusted FISH SANDWICH on a hearty bun with a tasty Sriracha-mayo "tartar" sauce (veg-friendly zucchini "fish" sandwich also available).

-JALAPEÑO-APPLE SLAW, dressed in a light, yet totally delish honey-lime vinaigrette.

-Lou's famous MAC N CHEESE made with xxxtra cheese and love.

Plus, for a few bucks more...

-Indulgent desserts prepared by Becca Hegarty of Bluebird Kitchen!

See you there!

https://twitter.com/fishfrypgh
